content: Obviously, Tom had a lot on his mind, but I had no choice but to ask him to spend some time helping us with our problems.
translations: ita:Ovviamente, Tom aveva un sacco per la testa, ma non avevo altra scelta che chiedergli di passare un po' di tempo per aiu
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by CK (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
